import React from "react"; /*export function RiskAssessmentForm() { return (

Health & Safety Risk Assessment Form

Details

Risk Assessors

Risk Matrix

{[ ['1 – Minor', [1, 2, 3, 4, 5], 'Low'], ['2 – Moderate', [2, 4, 6, 8, 10], ['Low', 'Low', 'Medium', 'Medium', 'Medium']], ['3 – Serious', [3, 6, 9, 12, 15], ['Low', 'Medium', 'Medium', 'High', 'High']], ['4 – Major', [4, 8, 12, 16, 20], ['Low', 'Medium', 'High', 'High', 'High']], ['5 – Fatal/Critical', [5, 10, 15, 20, 25], ['Low', 'Medium', 'High', 'High', 'Extreme']], ].map(([label, scores, levels], idx) => ( {scores.map((score, i) => ( ))} ))}
Severity / Consequence Probability / Likelihood
1 – Rare 2 – Unlikely 3 – Possible 4 – Likely 5 – Almost Certain
{label} {score} ({Array.isArray(levels) ? levels[i] : levels})

Risk Assessment

{[ "#", "Hazard Description", "Current Controls", "Inherent Risk (P × C)", "Additional Control Measures", "Residual Risk (P × C)", "Due Date", "Responsible Person", ].map((heading, idx) => ( ))} {[1, 2, 3, 4].map((row) => ( {[...Array(7)].map((_, idx) => ( ))} ))}
{heading}
{row}
); } */ const RiskAssessmentForm = () => { return (

Health & Safety Risk Assessment Form

{/* Details Section */}
Activity / Task / Facility
Date
Location
Time
{/* Risk Assessors Section */}

Risk Assessors

Name
Signature
{/* Risk Matrix Section */}

Risk Matrix

{[ ['1 – Minor', ['1 (Low)', '2 (Low)', '3 (Low)', '4 (Low)', '5 (Low)']], ['2 – Moderate', ['2 (Low)', '4 (Low)', '6 (Medium)', '8 (Medium)', '10 (Medium)']], ['3 – Serious', ['3 (Low)', '6 (Medium)', '9 (Medium)', '12 (High)', '15 (High)']], ['4 – Major', ['4 (Low)', '8 (Medium)', '12 (High)', '16 (High)', '20 (High)']], ['5 – Fatal/Critical', ['5 (Low)', '10 (Medium)', '15 (High)', '20 (High)', '25 (Extreme)']], ].map(([severity, values], i) => ( {values.map((val, j) => ( ))} ))}
Severity / Consequence Probability / Likelihood
1 – Rare 2 – Unlikely 3 – Possible 4 – Likely 5 – Almost Certain
{severity}{val}
{/* Risk Assessment Section */}

Risk Assessment

{[ '#', 'Hazard Description', 'Current Controls', 'Inherent Risk (P x C)', 'Additional Control Measures', 'Residual Risk (P x C)', 'Due Date', 'Responsible Person' ].map((header, i) => ( ))} {[1, 2, 3, 4].map((num) => ( {[...Array(8)].map((_, i) => ( ))} ))}
{header}
 
); }; export default RiskAssessmentForm;
